body_html:
I'm applying softmax to batch_size x length x length tensors, where batch size is 8-150 (typically around 90, and always a multiple of 8) and length is 30-200.

Some concrete sizes I sampled from running my code:

torch.Size([88, 194, 194])
torch.Size([104, 160, 160])
torch.Size([96, 181, 181])
torch.Size([96, 178, 178])

body:
I'm applying softmax to batch_size x length x length tensors, where batch size is 8-150 (typically around 90, and always a multiple of 8) and length is 30-200.

Some concrete sizes I sampled from running my code:
```
torch.Size([88, 194, 194])
torch.Size([104, 160, 160])
torch.Size([96, 181, 181])
torch.Size([96, 178, 178])
```
